title: Best pentakill?
body: The last game I played I was Rammus {{champion:33}}  and I was being a bit BM and just following around the enemy Kindred {{champion:203}}  because I was 15 and 1 so when I followed her she led me straight to the center of her team which was her, Yasuo {{champion:157}}, Ashe {{champion:22}}, Skarner {{champion:72}}, and Sona {{champion:37}}. So they went all agro on me so I popped my R and W and in less then 5 seconds the announcer shouted PENTAKILL and everyone on my team was flipping out since it was a solo 1v5 pentakill and I was Rammus of all champions... Well enough bragging I'd like to hear of the communities stories of their best Pentakill they have ever got?

replies.body: My best Penta ever was as Karthus, back at the start of S5. I pressed my ultimate instead of my ward by accident, and suddenly got a penta at baron pit.
look at the 1v5 ezreal pentakill from CLG Stixxay.. good micromanaging, dodging and outplay right there

AP Yi was the best Pentakill I have ever got.  It wasn't an all at once 1v5, but I did have to like a Panthion and Shen mid, then Roam into jungle to pick up the last three kills.  I have like 5hp after the fight.  Hourglass and W are the only reasons I lived through the stuns of Panth and Shen.  R.I.P. AP Yi  :(
Nice but that was 1 billion AP scaling Yi.
Do you have a Video of it?
Of mine? No but you can check my match history it's still the first one.
By existing you got a penta. Good job.
